description: Triangular array T given by T(n,k) = Sum{C(i,j): 0<=j<=i-n+k, n-k<=i<=n}.
comments: A054143 is the fission of the polynomial sequence ((x+1^n) by the polynomial sequence (q(n,x)) given by q(n,x)=x^n+x^(n-1)+...+x+1. See A193842 for the definition of fission. - _Clark Kimberling_, Aug 07 2011
formula: T(n,k) = Sum{C(i,j): 0<=j<=i-n+k, n-k<=i<=n}.T(n,k) = T(n-1,k) + 3*T(n-1,k-1) - 2*T(n-2,k-1) - 2*T(n-2,k-2), T(0,0)=1, T(n,k)=0 if k<0 or if k>n. - _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Nov 30 2013
